subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Since 1953, eight of the 13 golfers before Spieth who won two of the first three majors went on to finish in the top 10 in the P.G.A. Championship; Spieth is a 6-1 favorite to win.
snippet: Since 1953, eight of the 13 golfers before Spieth who won two of the first three majors went on to finish in the top 10 in the P.G.A. Championship; Spieth is a 6-1 favorite to win.
